Offers.title: Romantic Escape
Offers.description: Indulge in a candle-lit dinner, rose petal room decor, and a bottle of premium champagne on arrival.

Offers.title: Weekend Wellness Retrat
Offers.description: Rejuvenate your soul with unlimited spa access, guided yoga sessions, and organic gourmet breakfast.

Offers.title: Business Traveller Plus
Offers.description: Enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, complimentary airport transfers, and express laundry services for a seamless stay.

Offers.title: Family Fun Vacation
Offers.description: Kids stay and eat for free! Includes access to the water park, kids' club activities, and family suites.

Offers.title: Summer Early Bird
Offers.description: Book 30 days in advance to unlock exclusive discounts on luxury suites and rooftop pool access.

Reviews.name: Amit
Reviews.text: Excellent stay! Staff was very polite and helpful.

Reviews.name: Riya
Reviews.text: Rooms were clean and very comfortable. Loved the ambience.

Reviews.name: Karan
Reviews.text: Food quality was amazing, especially breakfast buffet.

Reviews.name: Neha
Reviews.text: Great location and peaceful environment. Worth the price.

Reviews.name: Rahul
Reviews.text: Luxury feel and quick service. Highly recommended!

Reviews.name: Pooja
Reviews.text: Very cozy rooms and friendly staff. Will visit again.

Reviews.name: Arjun
Reviews.text: Good experience overall. Minor delay in room service.

Reviews.name: Simran
Reviews.text: Beautiful interiors and very hygienic place.

Reviews.name: Anjali
Reviews.text: Loved the hospitality and warm welcome.

Reviews.name: Rohit
Reviews.text: Perfect for family stay. Safe and peaceful.

Reviews.name: Megha
Reviews.text: Good rooms, nice view, and great service.

Reviews.name: Sandeep
Reviews.text: Premium experience at a reasonable price.

Reviews.name: Nisha
Reviews.text: Clean rooms and tasty food. Enjoyed a lot.

Reviews.name: Manish
Reviews.text: One of the best hotels Iâ€™ve stayed in. Superb service!
